summary: AN ORDINANCE granting the Estate of Violett Diamond dba Vine Investment Company permission to maintain and operate two pedestrian skybridges over and across the 1st - 2nd Avenues Alley, south of Virginia Street, for a ten (10) year term, renewable for two successive ten-year terms, specifying the conditions under which this permit is granted, providing for acceptance of the permit and conditions, and superseding Ordinance 97422.
